JobFullDesc:
The company:
At Datadog, we’re on a mission to build the best monitoring platform in the world. We operate at high scale—trillions of data points per day—providing always-on alerting, metrics visualization, logs, and application tracing for tens of thousands of companies. Our engineering culture values pragmatism, honesty, and simplicity to solve hard problems the right way.
 
The opportunity:
You know how to work with a scaling team. You know how to find more users. You know to lead technical, and nontechnical, stakeholders and be a true partner in building the collateral that thousands of salespeople will use. You’re aware that distraction if amplified, could be detrimental to customers and the bottom line.
With a full team of resources, you will work on our most-leveraged products, growing our core user-base, to increase Datadog’s market share.
 
You will:

Learn everything about monitoring (theory, applications, best practices) and pour it back into building a great product.


Grow to understand our users (software developers, ops engineers) deeply; design solutions they find intuitive and delightful.
Define and lead the vision and strategy to drive business through new initiatives.
Scope, spec, and design new features, working with executives, designers, and engineers.
Work with a cross-functional team of product managers, product designers, engineers, and analysts to identify and execute on levers to achieve product-market fit for new initiatives
Work with marketing and customer success teams to evangelize new features and services that are easy to use and understand
Partner with customers escalating issues that are highly painful

 
Requirements:

A Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science or Engineering or equivalent experience
You have experience with hands-on software development.

 
Available opportunities:

Metrics
Log Monitoring
Agent Integrations
For more information on these opportunities, please visit our Blog!
